meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>seal</kanji>ed <kanji>chain</kanji> won't break or open so it gets in the way of everyone, forming a <vocabulary>blockade</vocabulary>. This can happen at banks too and it will result in them <vocabulary>freezing</vocabulary> your account!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
